name: Big Fat Neighbor
description:
Your Neighbor Is Planning Something.
If the neighbor is acting strange you will not feel safe

You should unlock the secret basement door and reveal great mystery

but it will not be so easy because, he knows that he entered the neighboring house.

Go into the house secretly and find all the secrets but be careful because the neighbor knows you came for him.
He set traps and hidden cameras in the house.
You should hide under the bed or the cabinet.


  • lots of puzzles and mystery
    colorful graphics
    animated cutscenes
